TAMIL NADU GOVERNMENT GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY
STATEMENT OF OBJECTS AND REASONS
After the Anna University became the sole affiliating type University in respect of Engineering Colleges in the State, on and from the Year 2001, it has been realized that the managing the affairs of more than 240 Engineering Colleges across the State from Chennai has become a near impossibility. With a view to ensure better and effective monitoring of the Engineering Colleges, the Government have decided to establish one more Technical Universities with clearly demarcated areas. One such University will be established at Madurai. This will be named as "Anna University of Technology, Madurai". The existing Engineering Colleges and also the Engineering Colleges which may be established in future, in this University area i.e., in the Districts of Madurai, Dindigul, Theni, Ramanathapuram and Sivagangai Districts will be affiliated to this University.
2. The Bill seeks to give effect to the above decision.
